column3: str

Seigetsu the Enlightened has concerns of an equestrian nature.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Find the Namazu horse enthusiast in Nhaama's Retreat.
Mount the horse, and ride it to the Mol horse handler.
Report to Seigetsu the Enlightened.
A fellow festival enthusiast volunteered to return one of the horses the Mol so graciously provided for our racing event, but I fear his “enthusiasm” is rather greater than his horsemanship...
To be perfectly blunt, he is an atrocious equestrian, and there is a distinct possibility that either he or the mount will be injured.

I would greatly appreciate it if you could find our would-be horse wrangler, and ensure the bodily integrity of both parties. Pray begin your search on the outskirts of Dhoro Iloh─I consider it <Emphasis>extremely</Emphasis> unlikely he has managed to travel more than a few dozen yalms beyond the Towering Still.
The Mol make it look so easy. Effortless. I thought I could just leap on its back, and gallop off across the steppe. But, no. No, no, no...
I don't know if I nudged the wrong spot or what, but we were suddenly racing down the side of the cliff! My entire life flashed before my bulging eyes!
Practice makes perfect, or so they say. ...They wouldn't say that if they saw my attempts at riding horses.
I did my best not to nudge the beast the wrong way, but once again I found myself hurtling down the cliffside at a breakneck pace. How fortunate that I have little neck to speak of, let alone break!
It might be best if I retire before I steer myself into a Matanga lair...
Please, would you ride the horse for me? Yes, yes?
A Mol horse handler was to meet me halfway. “Just follow the course of the river to the north,” Seigetsu said. Sounds simple enough, doesn't it...?

Oh, hello. When I saw the horse return alone, I was worried you'd been snagged by one of those long-toothed cats. Well, our Mol friend will be waiting, so it's back in the saddle for you! So to speak.
Do those stunted creatures even know how to ride...?
Speak with the Namazu horse enthusiast in Nhaama's Retreat to mount a horse, and then deliver the animal to the Mol horse handler.
...You are returning one of our horses? I expected a Namazu rider, but to be honest, I am somewhat relieved.
Hah, did you see it race away!? The poor beast must have been homesick for Mol Iloh!
I thank you for returning our animal in fine health. Pray send my regards to Seigetsu and his kin.
The horse will find its way home, worry not. Feel free to make your own way back to the Namazu.
<sigh> As expected, you were forced to salvage my shortsighted─and shortlimbed─kin's duty. I did try to dissuade him from his course...
In any case, my perspicacity in assigning your tasks has been borne out once again.

Unfortunately, however, our enthusiast's zeal is as unrelenting as my intellect, and he is surely doomed to repeat these ill-considered horseback disasters. In such an event, your assistance will once more be welcome.
